ComicInfo.Title: Bug Juice, The Curse of Camp Pickens, Down and Out and Death Cursed
ComicInfo.Summary: Camp Pickens has always been the go-to summer destination for the younger residents of Riverdale. It's a rite of passage for the teen residents to hold the coveted camp counselor positions. However, Camp Pickens mysterious past shrouds a deep, dark secret: it's cursed, and this summer all of its campers are going to find out the hard way in this one-shot anthology that's equal parts Sleepaway Camp and American Horror Story: 1984, reuniting the team behind the mega-hit comic series Revival.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:15:27. [CVDB997774]
ComicInfo.Writer: Blake Howard, Jordan Morris, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.Penciller: Carola Borelli, Diana Camero, Mike Norton
ComicInfo.Inker: Carola Borelli, Diana Camero, Mike Norton
